00004 void SequentialNode::init(void* agent)
00005 {
00006         currentPosition = -1;
00007         for (BehaviorTreeListIter iter = children.begin(); iter!= children.end(); iter++)
00008                 (*iter)->init(agent);
00009 }

00011 SequentialNode::SequentialNode()
00012 {
00013         currentPosition = -1;
00014 }
00015

00017 BEHAVIOR_STATUS SequentialNode::execute(void* agent)
00018 {
00019         if (currentPosition == -1) //starting out
00020         {
00021                 init(agent);
00022                 currentPosition = 0;
00023         }
00024 
00025         if (children.size() == 0)
00026                 return BT_SUCCESS;
00027 
00028         BehaviorTreeNode* currentTask = children.at(currentPosition);
00029         BEHAVIOR_STATUS result = currentTask->execute(agent);
00030 
00031         while(result == BT_SUCCESS)
00032         {
00033                 if (currentPosition == children.size()-1) //finished last task
00034                 {
00035                         currentPosition = -1; //indicate we are not running anything
00036                         return BT_SUCCESS;
00037                 }
00038                 else
00039                 {
00040                         currentPosition++;
00041                         currentTask = children.at(currentPosition);
00042                         result = currentTask->execute(agent);
00043                 }
00044         }
00045         if (result == BT_FAILURE)
00046                 currentPosition = -1;
00047         return result;
00048 }
